template <typename Block, typename Ordering>
class vsip::impl::Permuted_block
File: ../../../vsip/core/subblock.hpp

The Permuted_block class reorders the indices to a 3-dimensional block, and the dimensions visible via 2-argument size(). The permutation is specified as a tuple (see [support]).
